name: nxt-backend
dockerCompose:
version: '3.8'
services:
  nxt-backend:
    build: .
    container_name: nxt-backend
    ports:
      - "4000:4000"
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=4000
      - DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:password@localhost:5432/nxt_backend
      - JWT_SECRET=change-this-secret-key
      - ENCRYPTION_KEY=change-this-encryption-key
      - REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379
      - API_BASE_URL=http://152.53.114.19:4000
      - FRONTEND_URL=http://152.53.114.19:3000
      - LOG_LEVEL=info
    restart: unless-stopped
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "wget", "--no-verbose", "--tries=1", "--spider", "http://localhost:4000/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
environment:
NODE_ENV=production
PORT=4000
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:password@localhost:5432/nxt_backend
JWT_SECRET=change-this-secret-key
ENCRYPTION_KEY=change-this-encryption-key
REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379
API_BASE_URL=http://152.53.114.19:4000
FRONTEND_URL=http://152.53.114.19:3000
LOG_LEVEL=info
